cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to loopback address '127.0.0.1' makes AMF unreachable, causing NG-AMF interface connection failures and routing misconfiguration.

du.explanation_en: Setting remote_n_address to loopback '127.0.0.1' prevents DU from reaching CU, causing F1 interface connection failures and unreachable routing definitions.
